statements.statements: if ($L.type=4 and same(name in $L.new, name in $L.old)) then for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(assignment.groups in $L.new)) do (if (not (null($L.i in assignment.groups in $L.new))) then if (index($L.i in assignment.groups in $L.new, assignment.groups in $L.old)=0) then ($L.add.assignment=$L.add.assignment+{$L.i in assignment.groups in $L.new}))

if ($L.type=4 and same(name in $L.new, name in $L.old)) then for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(assignment.groups in $L.old)) do (if (not (null($L.i in assignment.groups in $L.old))) then if (index($L.i in assignment.groups in $L.old, assignment.groups in $L.new)=0) then ($L.remove.assignment=$L.remove.assignment+{$L.i in assignment.groups in $L.old}))
if ($L.type=4 and not (same(name in $L.new, name in $L.old))) then ($L.add.assignment=assignment.groups in $L.new;$L.remove.assignment=assignment.groups in $L.old)

if ($L.type=4 and same(name in $L.new, name in $L.old)) then for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(named.modules in $L.new)) do (if (not (null($L.i in named.modules in $L.new))) then if (index($L.i in named.modules in $L.new, named.modules in $L.old)=0) then ($L.add.module=$L.add.module+{$L.i in named.modules in $L.new}))

if ($L.type=4 and same(name in $L.new, name in $L.old)) then for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(named.modules in $L.old)) do (if (not (null($L.i in named.modules in $L.old))) then if (index($L.i in named.modules in $L.old, named.modules in $L.new)=0) then ($L.remove.module=$L.remove.module+{$L.i in named.modules in $L.old}))
if ($L.type=4 and not (same(name in $L.new, name in $L.old))) then ($L.add.module=named.modules in $L.new;$L.remove.module=named.modules in $L.old)

if ($L.type=4 and same(name in $L.new, name in $L.old)) then for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(kmgroup in $L.new)) do (if (not (null($L.i in kmgroup in $L.new))) then if (index($L.i in kmgroup in $L.new, kmgroup in $L.old)=0) then ($L.add.kmgroup=$L.add.kmgroup+{$L.i in kmgroup in $L.new}))

if ($L.type=4 and same(name in $L.new, name in $L.old)) then for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(kmgroup in $L.old)) do (if (not (null($L.i in kmgroup in $L.old))) then if (index($L.i in kmgroup in $L.old, kmgroup in $L.new)=0) then ($L.remove.kmgroup=$L.remove.kmgroup+{$L.i in kmgroup in $L.old}))
if ($L.type=4 and not (same(name in $L.new, name in $L.old))) then ($L.add.kmgroup=kmgroup in $L.new;$L.remove.kmgroup=kmgroup in $L.old)
